text:
is a mental health awareness 
programme from Aware which 
can give you knowledge and 
skills to help you look after 
the mental health of you and 
your baby. It is delivered using 
a range of methods including 
group activities, discussions, 
video clips, and animation, music 
and fun activities.
Mood Matters Parent and 
Baby lasts one-and-a-half to 
two hours and is available in 
a range of settings. Content 
is tailored to meet the needs 
of each group and the 
programme is available to
